operator.name: Read Compounds
operator.help: This operator reads compounds from molecular files. CDK library is used to read the molecular files so most file formats (e.g. MDL mol/sdf, PDB, SMILES, etc) are supported. The operator can read compounds from a single file or from all supported files in one or several directories. The operator can also read just a single compound from a file containing multiple compounds. After reading the compounds, basic information like name of compound, number of atoms, bonds, fragments and hydrogen atoms are computed and displayed.

operator.name: Write Compounds
operator.help: This operator writes compounds to one or several molecular files. CDK library is used to write the molecular files. MDL mol/sdf, PDB, SMILES and Sybyl mol2 molecular formats are supported.

operator.name: Count Substructure
operator.synopsis: Count number of times that a substructure is present in a molecule.
operator.help: This operator counts the number of times that a substructure is present in a molecule. Aromaticity should be detected using the Detect Aromaticity operator and hydrogen atoms should be added using the Add Hydrogens operator before using this operator.

operator.name: Detect Dimensionality
operator.help: This operator computes the mean, minimum and maximum x, y, z coordinates of a molecule and detects its dimensionality (0D, 1D, 2D or 3D).

operator.name: Get SMILES
operator.synopsis: Get SMILES structure for a molecule.
operator.help: This operator shows the SMILES structure for a molecule.

operator.name: Add Hydrogens
operator.help: This operator adds hydrogen atoms based on atom type definitions.

operator.name: Convert to 3D
operator.help: This operator converts a molecule to 3D coordinates. Aromaticity should be detected using the Detect Aromaticity operator and hydrogen atoms should be added using the Add Hydrogens operator before using this operator.

operator.name: Standardize
operator.help: This operator standardizes a molecule by removing salts, detect aromaticity, standardize tautomers and standardize nitro groups.

operator.name: Rename Compound
operator.help: This operator is used to rename a compound.

operator.name: Calculate Descriptors
operator.help: This is the RapidMiner operator for PaDEL-Descriptor. It uses the same descriptor calculation engine as PaDEL-Descriptor.
